raw_comment:
I noticed that MLS is has the most diversity in Coaches and the NBA and WNBA has the most diversity in players.
I wonder why the MLB has the least amount of diversity in players. Is it because baseball isn't spreading their game around the world??
The impact is that eventually players and coaches will be a lot more diverse in these 5 leagues. Some leagues are giving benefits for hiring a diverse candidate.
Headline: Leagues are becoming more diverse, but is it enough?
ace_sentences: I noticed that MLS has the most diversity in coaches.
I noticed that the NBA has the most diversity in players.
I noticed that the WNBA has the most diversity in players.
I wonder why MLB has the least diversity in players.
Maybe baseball does not spread the game around the world.
Eventually, players in these 5 leagues will be more diverse.
Eventually, coaches in these 5 leagues will be more diverse.
Some leagues give benefits for hiring a diverse candidate.
The headline is: Leagues are becoming more diverse, but is it enough?
